expressionInfo.expression:
/* Open the Suggestions tab and choose a template to get started creating different content types for your pop-up. To learn more about using Arcade to create pop-up content visit: https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/guide/profiles/#popup-element */ var result var img_share_url = 'https://vdq.maps.arcgis.com/sharing/rest/content/items/' var td_style = 'style="text-align:left;"' var img_style = 'style="padding-right: 15px;"' var url_fiche = `${$feature.URL_FICHE}` var img_fiche = img_share_url + '9fe6402ca05245a8847f1d6bd51dd9a5/data' var url_collecte = `${$feature.URL_INFO_COLLECTE}` var img_collecte = img_share_url + 'ce561893a9d147eebd8d12025b5bf93f/data' var url_google = `${$feature.URL_GOOGLE}` var img_google = img_share_url + 'cd385033732a4f1383c40ea14d1cee51/data' result += '' result += '' result += `` result += `` result += `` result += '' result += '
' return { type : 'text', text : result }
